General.Name: Jiangxi Xinyu Guoke Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Jiangxi Xinyu Guoke Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells military products. It offers blasting and silhouette equipment, meteorological special technical equipment, human shadow and meteorological equipment, military explosives, military training equipment, meteorological rockets, and pyrotechnic components and devices. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Xinyu, China.
